constraints.name: distinctness
constraints.description: 序列中的任意两个数字互不相同
constraints.formal: ∀ i, j ∈ [1, n], i ≠ j → a_i ≠ a_j

constraints.name: permutation_constraint
constraints.description: 序列排序后得到的排列必须与给定排列一致

constraints.name: subsequence_constraint
constraints.description: 需要找到符合给定排列的所有子串
constraints.formal: find all subsequences of h that match the permutation p
